get.description:
- requires: if_option selected  then_group/option must be selected (optionally from allowed_options list)
- conflicts: if_option selected  then_option must NOT be selected  
- hides: if_option selected  then_group/option is hidden
- price_tier: quantity-based pricing adjustments

configuration_rules.description:
Business rules for valid product configurations. Supported rule types:
- requires: if_option selected  then_group/option must be selected (optionally from allowed_options list)
- conflicts: if_option selected  then_option must NOT be selected  
- hides: if_option selected  then_group/option is hidden
- price_tier: quantity-based pricing adjustments

id.description:
Note:
This is a Primary Key.<pk/>

template_id.description:
Note:
This is a Foreign Key to `product_templates.id`.<fk table='product_templates' column='id'/>

error_message.description: User-facing message when validation rule fails

if_option_id.description:
Note:
This is a Foreign Key to `options.id`.<fk table='options' column='id'/>

if_group_id.description:
Note:
This is a Foreign Key to `option_groups.id`.<fk table='option_groups' column='id'/>

if_product_id.description:
Note:
This is a Foreign Key to `products.id`.<fk table='products' column='id'/>

then_option_id.description:
Note:
This is a Foreign Key to `options.id`.<fk table='options' column='id'/>

then_group_id.description:
Note:
This is a Foreign Key to `option_groups.id`.<fk table='option_groups' column='id'/>

then_product_id.description:
Note:
This is a Foreign Key to `products.id`.<fk table='products' column='id'/>

priority.description: Evaluation order: lower numbers evaluated first

allowed_options.description: For "requires" rules with then_group_id: list of option IDs that are valid selections. If specified, the selected option must be in this list. Example: i9 requires RAM group with allowed_options=[32GB_id, 64GB_id] means only 32GB+ is valid.

variant_attributes.description: Variant dimension definitions per tenant (e.g., Color, Size)

id.description:
Note:
This is a Primary Key.<pk/>

Note:
This is a Primary Key.<pk/>

category_id.description:
Note:
This is a Foreign Key to `product_categories.id`.<fk table='product_categories' column='id'/>

is_configurable.description: Flag indicating if this product requires CPQ configuration. If true, a template_id should be set.

template_id.description:
Reference to the CPQ template used to configure this product. Bidirectional link with product_templates.base_product_id.

Note:
This is a Foreign Key to `product_templates.id`.<fk table='product_templates' column='id'/>

has_variants.description: True if this product is a parent with variants

selected_options.description: JSONB: {group_id: option_id} for single, {group_id: [ids]} for multi

share_token.description: Unique token for shareable configuration links

is_template.description: Flag indicating if this configuration is saved as a reusable template. Templates can be loaded by users to start new configurations.

template_name.description: Human-readable name for templates (e.g., "Standard Gaming PC", "Budget Office Setup"). Only set when is_template=true.

source_configuration_id.description:
Reference to the original configuration when this was cloned. Used for tracking configuration lineage and analytics.

Note:
This is a Foreign Key to `configurations.id`.<fk table='configurations' column='id'/>

source_snapshot.description: Snapshot of the source configuration/template state at clone time. Stores: template name, option groups with options, prices, and rules. Immutable after creation  allows historical comparison.

variant_attribute_values.description: Allowed values for each variant attribute

id.description:
Note:
This is a Primary Key.<pk/>

attribute_id.description:
Note:
This is a Foreign Key to `variant_attributes.id`.<fk table='variant_attributes' column='id'/>

rowFilter.price_lists.priority.name: priority
rowFilter.price_lists.priority.description: Higher number wins when multiple lists apply to same customer

rowFilter.configured_products.configurat.name: configuration_snapshot
rowFilter.configured_products.configurat.description: Immutable snapshot of all selections at order time

rowFilter.template_presets.selected_opti.name: selected_options
rowFilter.template_presets.selected_opti.description: Pre-selected options in same JSONB format as configurations.selected_options

rowFilter.template_presets.badge_text.name: badge_text
rowFilter.template_presets.badge_text.description: Optional badge like "Most Popular" or "Best Value" displayed on preset card

rowFilter.bom_headers.version.name: version
rowFilter.bom_headers.version.description: BOM version (e.g., 1.0, 2.0) - allows multiple BOMs per product

rowFilter.bom_headers.effective_date.name: effective_date
rowFilter.bom_headers.effective_date.description: Date when this BOM becomes active

rowFilter.bom_headers.obsolete_date.name: obsolete_date
rowFilter.bom_headers.obsolete_date.description: Date when this BOM is no longer used

rowFilter.option_groups.source_type.name: source_type
rowFilter.option_groups.source_type.description: manual=static options in options table, category=dynamic from product_categories

rowFilter.option_groups.source_category_.name: source_category_id
rowFilter.option_groups.source_category_.description: For category source: pull products from this category subtree as options

rowFilter.option_groups.category_price_m.name: category_price_mode
rowFilter.option_groups.category_price_m.description: For category source: how to determine price modifier from product data

rowFilter.product_templates.base_price.name: base_price
rowFilter.product_templates.base_price.description: Starting price before any options are added

rowFilter.product_templates.base_product.name: base_product_id
rowFilter.product_templates.base_product.description: Optional link to an existing catalog product

rowFilter.bom_items.parent_item_id.name: parent_item_id
rowFilter.bom_items.parent_item_id.description: NULL for root level, otherwise references parent assembly

rowFilter.bom_items.is_assembly.name: is_assembly
rowFilter.bom_items.is_assembly.description: TRUE if this item has child components

rowFilter.bom_items.is_phantom.name: is_phantom
rowFilter.bom_items.is_phantom.description: TRUE for logical groupings that don't exist in inventory

rowFilter.product_variants.attribute_val.name: attribute_values
rowFilter.product_variants.attribute_val.description: JSONB map of attribute_name  value, e.g. {"color":"Red","size":"M"}

rowFilter.configuration_rules.error_mess.name: error_message
rowFilter.configuration_rules.error_mess.description: User-facing message when validation rule fails

rowFilter.configuration_rules.priority.name: priority
rowFilter.configuration_rules.priority.description: Evaluation order: lower numbers evaluated first

rowFilter.configuration_rules.allowed_op.name: allowed_options
rowFilter.configuration_rules.allowed_op.description: For "requires" rules with then_group_id: list of option IDs that are valid selections. If specified, the selected option must be in this list. Example: i9 requires RAM group with allowed_options=[32GB_id, 64GB_id] means only 32GB+ is valid.

rowFilter.products.is_configurable.name: is_configurable
rowFilter.products.is_configurable.description: Flag indicating if this product requires CPQ configuration. If true, a template_id should be set.

rowFilter.products.template_id.name: template_id
rowFilter.products.template_id.description: Reference to the CPQ template used to configure this product. Bidirectional link with product_templates.base_product_id.

rowFilter.products.has_variants.name: has_variants
rowFilter.products.has_variants.description: True if this product is a parent with variants

rowFilter.cpq_options.price_modifier_typ.name: price_modifier_type
rowFilter.cpq_options.price_modifier_typ.description: add = +$X, multiply = Y, replace = set price to $Z

rowFilter.quotes.revision.name: revision
rowFilter.quotes.revision.description: Version number  increments when quote is revised

rowFilter.quotes.margin_pct.name: margin_pct
rowFilter.quotes.margin_pct.description: Calculated margin %  used for approval routing when below tenant min_margin_pct

rowFilter.quotes.converted_order_id.name: converted_order_id
rowFilter.quotes.converted_order_id.description: FK to orders  set when status transitions to converted

rowFilter.options.product_id.name: product_id
rowFilter.options.product_id.description: Link to catalog product for inventory/BOM integration

rowFilter.quote_items.cost_source.name: cost_source
rowFilter.quote_items.cost_source.description: How unit_cost was determined: bom, cpq, manual, list_price

rowFilter.cpq_option_groups.selection_ty.name: selection_type
rowFilter.cpq_option_groups.selection_ty.description: single = radio buttons (pick one), multiple = checkboxes (pick many)

rowFilter.cpq_option_groups.source_type.name: source_type
rowFilter.cpq_option_groups.source_type.description: manual = static options, category = dynamic from product_categories

rowFilter.tenants.base_currency.name: base_currency
rowFilter.tenants.base_currency.description: ISO 4217 currency code  all prices stored in this currency

rowFilter.tenants.compliance_plugins.name: compliance_plugins
rowFilter.tenants.compliance_plugins.description: Array of country codes for activated compliance plugins, e.g. {IL,EU_VAT}

rowFilter.tenants.min_margin_pct.name: min_margin_pct
rowFilter.tenants.min_margin_pct.description: Minimum profit margin %  quotes below this are routed to approval (NULL = no check)

rowFilter.configurations.selected_option.name: selected_options
rowFilter.configurations.selected_option.description: JSONB: {group_id: option_id} for single, {group_id: [ids]} for multi

rowFilter.configurations.share_token.name: share_token
rowFilter.configurations.share_token.description: Unique token for shareable configuration links

rowFilter.configurations.is_template.name: is_template
rowFilter.configurations.is_template.description: Flag indicating if this configuration is saved as a reusable template. Templates can be loaded by users to start new configurations.

rowFilter.configurations.template_name.name: template_name
rowFilter.configurations.template_name.description: Human-readable name for templates (e.g., "Standard Gaming PC", "Budget Office Setup"). Only set when is_template=true.

rowFilter.configurations.source_configur.name: source_configuration_id
rowFilter.configurations.source_configur.description: Reference to the original configuration when this was cloned. Used for tracking configuration lineage and analytics.

rowFilter.configurations.source_snapshot.name: source_snapshot
rowFilter.configurations.source_snapshot.description: Snapshot of the source configuration/template state at clone time. Stores: template name, option groups with options, prices, and rules. Immutable after creation  allows historical comparison.
